document_data.name: Grease
document_data.mainbody: '''''Grease''''' (originally called '''''Shan's tallow''''' [[Ilsensine]], [[Laogzed]], were granted the power of ''grease'' by their deities, and [[ooze genasi]] could create a similar effect.{{Cite dragon/297/Children of the Cosmos|65}}
document_data.Effects: This spell would coat a single object or a ten-foot-square surface within a close range with a layer of slippery grease, which would last for a number of seconds depending on the power of the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, the caster required a piece of [[butter]] or a bit of [[pork|pork rind]], although any similarly greasy substance could in theory be substituted. This [[material component]] disappeared as the spell was cast.
document_data.History:
The spell was invented by the [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Shan (arcanist)|Shan]] in {{Yearlink|-644}}.

In the month of [[Eleasis]], of the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, the city of [[Ravens Bluff]]'s [[Ministry of Art]] and [[Wizards Guild]] jointly declared it illegal to cast ''grease'' within city limits due to a raging unnatural storm at the time called the [[Soulstorm]]. In addition to threatening arrest for those that broke this decree, it was declared that breaking this prohibition would result in a permanent expulsion from either organization.{{Cite trumpeter/2-8|2}}{{LCRB}}
